file_content.text: You really saved my hide. I can't wait to get out of here.
You made it! Good work. The transmitters are all broadcasting beautifully. Once I've got all the data, I can finally get out of here.
Here, your payment. Everything I've got, just like I promised. Small price to pay to keep breathing, right? Thanks for your help.
The droids are in the palace, not out here!
Psst! Hey, you! I wanna talk to you. You headed into Fa'athra's palace?
If you're crazy enough to go in there, we might be able to help each other out. Interested in making a few credits?
I'm always up for something crazy. What do you need?
If it's crazy, I'm in.
Credits, you say?
You look a little shady to me--who are you?
Hmm, I dunno....
I work for Nem'ro. My partner did too, until he bought it--there, in the palace. He snuck in as a maintenance worker to plant transmitters on the cleaning droids.
The idea was we'd use these transmitters to track the movements of the droids.
As the droids cleaned the floors and walls, they'd map out every nook and cranny. We were hoping to find secret entrances or hidden chambers in the palace.
So your partner wasn't able to plant the transmitters?
The plan didn't work?
Actually, he was.
So what do you expect me to do, exactly? Go undercover as a cleaning droid?
Where do I come in?
No, no, nothing like that. Although... no, nevermind. Look, here's the deal:
That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard.
That's ridiculous.
It would have worked. It still can work.
My partner was able to plant the transmitters on the droids, but his cover was blown before he could activate them.
Me, I'd be dead if I tried to go in there and finish the job. But if those transmitters don't get activated, I'm dead anyway. Nem'ro doesn't tolerate failure.
So I'll pay you everything I've got to activate those transmitters for me.
No problem. I'll have those transmitters activated in no time.
I'm on it.
Well, I'm gonna be storming the palace anyway. I'll see what I can do.
Guess I'll give it a shot.
All you have to do is find the cleaning droids and flip a little switch on the attached transmitter. Simple as that.
I'll wait for you here. Good luck.
Do it yourself, coward.
No chance. [Refuse quest]
Blast. All right, I'll be here if you change your mind.
I don't think you can help me right now. Quick, get out of here before Fa'athra's guards see us talking.
